record.title: CURRENCY REFORM AND FINANCIAL MARKETS ACCESS ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the attached letter from the American Council of Life Insurers be printed in the RECORD, along with the materials I submitted for S. 1677, the Currency Reform and Financial Markets Access Act of 2007.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the Record, as follows:
